prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If no candidate fits, set selected_product_id to null and explain in package_notes.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        ```json
    ],

    ]
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "BBQ Beef Sloppy Joes with Chakalaka",
  "description": "Family-friendly sloppy joes with a sweet-mild BBQ filling, served on soft burger buns with a South African chakalaka topper.",
  "servings": "Serves 4",
  "prep_steps": [
    "Preheat oven to 180°C/350°F to warm the buns.",
    "Finely chop 1 onion.",
    "Dice 1 bell pepper.",
    "Peel and mince 2 cloves garlic.",
    "Open the chakalaka can/jar."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat.",
    "Add onion and bell pepper; cook 3–4 minutes until softened.",
    "Add beef mince; cook 5–7 minutes, breaking it up, until browned. Spoon off excess fat if needed.",
    "Stir in garlic; cook 30 seconds.",
    "Add barbecue sauce and tomato paste with a splash of water; stir to coat. Simmer 3–4 minutes until thick and glossy.",
    "Season with salt and pepper to taste; lower heat to keep warm.",
    "Warm burger buns in the oven for 3–5 minutes until soft and toasty.",
    "Split buns, pile the BBQ beef onto the bottoms.",
    "Spoon chakalaka over the meat or serve on the side.",
    "Top with bun lids and serve."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "beef mince",
      "quantity": "500 g"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "onion",
      "quantity": "1 medium",
      "preparation": "finely chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "bell peppers",
      "quantity": "1 medium",
      "preparation": "diced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "garlic",
      "quantity": "2 cloves",
      "preparation": "minced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "barbecue sauce",
      "quantity": "1/2 cup"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "tomato paste",
      "quantity": "2 tablespoons"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "olive oil",
      "quantity": "1 tablespoon"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "salt",
      "quantity": "to taste"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "pepper",
      "quantity": "to taste"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "burger buns",
      "quantity": "8 small buns (or 4 large)"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "chakalaka",
      "quantity": "1 cup"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "DietaryRestrictions": [
      "None"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "American",
      "SouthAfrican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "15to30"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "None"
    ],
    "NutritionFocus": [
      "HighProtein"
    ],
    "Equipment": [
      "Oven",
      "StoveTop"
    ],
    "MealComponentPreference": [
      "FromScratch",
      "SemiPrepared"
    ]
  }
}
        ```
